description: Exceptions such as "socket.error: [Errno 101] ENETUNREACH" are not being caught, causing nova-compute to fail.
title: _get_my_ip in flags.py does not catch some socket exceptions

comments.content: Exceptions such as "socket.error: [Errno 101] ENETUNREACH" are not being caught, causing nova-compute to fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane
